definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (app. n.gent. from foregoing, but LXX Nu 26:17 )Arihl (Ge 46:16 )Arohleiv, )Arohdiv, )Aphdeiv) = foregoing) a son of Gad Ge 46:16, Nu 26:17; also

definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: c. art. as n.pr. coll. Nu 26:17 [[מִשְׁפַּחַת הָאַרְאֵלִי]] LXX )Arihlei.
